title: Rose Gold Zircon Mangalsutra: A Modern Take on Tradition
materials: Crafted in high-quality rose gold plated alloy with a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster. Features meticulously placed Zircon stones. Complemented by traditional black beads.
features: A delicate two-strand design, offering a modern interpretation of the traditional Mangalsutra. Each strand is adorned with black beads, culminating in a dazzling Zircon pendant. The lower pendant features a floral design, adding a touch of femininity.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for a newly married woman. Suitable for modern brides who appreciate both tradition and contemporary style. Pairs well with both Indian and Western attire.
description: This Rose Gold Zircon Mangalsutra is a testament to the evolving tastes of the modern woman. It blends the sacred symbolism of the Mangalsutra with a chic, contemporary design. The rose gold plating lends a warm and radiant glow, while the Zircon stones add a touch of sparkle. Durable construction ensures lasting beauty.
